segments.text: Good day ! Welcome to Lincoln Bank , how may we assist you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I need to find out if a Receipt of Proceeds has arrived . I'm from Felix Wasserman Associates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Have you got the L / C number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hang on a tick and I'll check for you . I'm sorry ; we have no record of that arriving .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , thanks for checking . Could you give me a ring when it arrives , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I'll be in touch as soon as it comes in .
segments.speaker: S1
